mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO tbl_collectioninfo (userId, opernId, delFlg, updateDataTime) VALUES (#{userId}, #{opernId}, '0', now())
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_collectioninfo SET delFlg = '1', updateDataTime = now() WHERE userId = #{userId} AND opernId = #{opernId} AND delFlg = '0'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_collectioninfo WHERE userId = #{userId} AND delFlg = '0' ORDER BY updateDataTime DESC
SELECT * FROM tbl_collectioninfo WHERE userId = #{userId} AND opernId = #{opernId} AND delFlg = '0' LIMIT 1

SELECT A.*, B.opernIndex, B.opernTitle, B.opernImg FROM (SELECT * FROM tbl_operninfo INNER JOIN tbl_collectioninfo ON tbl_operninfo.id = tbl_collectioninfo.opernId WHERE userId = #{userId} AND delFlg = '0') A INNER JOIN tbl_opernimginfo B ON A.id = B.opernId ORDER BY A.updateDataTime DESC , A.views DESC, B.opernIndex ASC
